programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping) S1 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping»The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure) S1 (18/33)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le cerf-volant) S1 (25/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le cerf-volant»It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie le poisson) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie le poisson»Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête forraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête forraine»The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Minou Mimi) S3 (22/26)
programme.desc: «Minou Mimi»Molly and Gil find a lost kitten named Bubble Kitty, and the Guppies learn that house cats are related to big cats. When Bubble Kitty's owner calls, the kids take Bubble Kitty home to Meownt Rushmore, a rocky tribute to cats!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale»Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse»Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue: After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie) S5 (21/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie»Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et son quartier) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington et son quartier»Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens: Paddington and the kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? (S2, ep 26a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Excursion en montagne) S2 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Excursion en montagne»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La maison de Rebecca Rabbit) S2 (39/52)
programme.desc: «La maison de Rebecca Rabbit»Peppa and her entire class go on a school trip to the mountains. There they discover the ultrasound, exchange their lunch and have a wonderful day. And before they get back they also sing the Bing-Bong song!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «The Collection»Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La grande fête de Blue) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La grande fête de Blue»Show us your dance moves! Josh and Blue are having a dance party, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite dance. As we groove to find clues, we learn Magenta's favorite dance and help Bunny Jo learn a new dance!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Super-Secoueur) S8 (16/24)
programme.desc: «Le Super-Secoueur»Pups Stop a Super Shaker: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. (S8, ep 16a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «L'Échangeur / Touche pas à mon oeuf»Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets) S1 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets»Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Maître Christophe) S1 (47/78)
programme.desc: «Maître Christophe»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The Gift Box: The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. But he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift. (S1, ep 78).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Mysterious Visitor: Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. (S1, ep 65).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Tous à la piscine) S2 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Tous à la piscine»Peppa and George learn to swim, just like Kelly and Karel Konijn. And that swimming is fun through all your life, Papa Pig shows.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Sire Blaze et la licorne) S6 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Sire Blaze et la licorne»Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Derby Dino) S6 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Derby Dino»Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir) S4 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Le shampoing volumateur / La machine à rétrécir»The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel) S4 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Une chatte citadine / Du surf en plein ciel»Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «La Tour de l'espace / C'est magique»Mr. Steel wants to go to the moon and orders Professor Sketch to turn the Steel Tower into a rocket! A magician lures the audience away from Rammy's presentation, who gets so angry that he takes it out on the man's hat.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Jeunesse éternelle) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Jeunesse éternelle»Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping) S1 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping»The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage pour la lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage pour la lune»Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grand-père à l'aire de jeux) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Grand-père à l'aire de jeux»Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie le poisson) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie le poisson»Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête forraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête forraine»The family go to the funfair, but Mummy Pig is angry when people at the fair tell her that she will not be able to win prizes in the competitions, just like George is sad because the mini golf course is too big for him.

programme.desc: «Santiago et Bonnie à la rescousse»Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue: After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie) S5 (21/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie»Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et son quartier) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington et son quartier»Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens: Paddington and the kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? (S2, ep 26a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La panne de courant) S2 (47/52)
programme.desc: «La panne de courant»One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. Peppa is surprised to find that even the television won't work without electricity. While the family wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play in the dark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts»Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (n°61)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Backwards Ron Day: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. (S1, ep 61).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»The Amazing Guesser: After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! (S1, ep 51).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (n°52)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de brume) S2 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de brume»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de George) S2 (26/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de George»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le badge de course de Sparkle) S6 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Le badge de course de Sparkle»It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course de la Montagne Céleste) S6 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La course de la Montagne Céleste»At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas) S5 (26/26)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas»Ace's birthday and the puppies are building a nice birthday present for her. Mayor Humdinger wants the present himself. Adventure Bay wants to break the world record for highest pizza makers. But of course Mayor Humdinger wants that too.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!
